summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3990 for the improvement of Chicago Street, from Rainier Avenue to 46th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by construction of concrete walks, under Ordinance No. 48530 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
